text.title: The BEST drugstore leave in conditioners I've EVER tried!
text.p: these are the best drugstore leave-in
ever tried this one's going to be for
you if you have super tangly hair if
your hair is really fine or thin and
gets weighed Down super easily this is
my top recommendation if you love an oil
Mist then you'll love Eva NYC it
definitely is a little bit oilier than
the other options but it makes your hair
feel super soft Tresemme heat Tamer is
the only one that actually makes my
curls last longer normally my hair
doesn't hold to curl this is great for
that for that super glassy glossy hair
look and frizz reduction you gotta go
